review: "Sqaq L-Infern" is a captivating start to the Il-Fiddien series, weaving an intricate tapestry of mystery and medieval magic. The narrative draws you into a unique journey that blends drama and adventure with historical elements, creating a rich and immersive reading experience. Despite some dense passages, the story's momentum and the vivid world-building make it a worthwhile read for fans of fantastical tales.
